content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great investment. How much were you considering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Schmidt, I am a student and I can offer 450 euros per month for this apartment. I think this is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but 450 euros is much lower than what I was expecting. This apartment is brand new and in a prime location. The market value for such an apartment is significantly higher. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Schmidt. However, I am a student and I have to consider my monthly expenses. I can offer 480 euros per month. This is the highest I can afford.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your situation as a student, but 480 euros is still not reflective of the value of this apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the quality and location of this property. Can you at least consider going up to 550 euros? It's a reasonable increase from your initial offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I hear you, Schmidt. However, 550 euros is way out of my budget. I think 490 euros would be a more reasonable compromise. This is a fair increase from my previous offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I understand that you're trying to negotiate, but 490 euros is still not acceptable to me. This apartment offers a lot, including proximity to all amenities. I'm willing to consider a tenant who values such conveniences and is willing to pay for them. How about 520 euros? This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Schmidt. 520 euros is a significant increase from my initial offer. However, I am willing to meet you halfway. I can offer 500 euros. This is my final offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your final offer of 500 euros is still not enough for me to agree to. This apartment is in high demand due to its quality and location. I'm looking for a tenant who is willing to pay the market value. If you're unable to meet my price, I'm sorry, but we may have to end this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am unable to meet your price. I hope we can part ways amicably.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Max. I appreciate your time and effort in discussing the rental price. If you change your mind or are able to reconsider your offer, feel free to contact me. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
